description.value: You expose this reality to a realm of pure darkness filled with gibbering voices and otherworldly entities. The area of your quantum field functions as though it were an area of 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness}. Creatures that begin their turn in the area must succeed at a @Check[will|against:witchwarper] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round. Creatures that critically succeed are then immune for 24 hours. If this darkness is successfully counteracted, the quantum field's other effects remain.
